name: Air Force 1
longDescription: The Nike Air Force 1 features a durable leather upper, perforated toe box, and encapsulated Air-Sole unit. A streetwear staple since 1982.

name: Air Max 270
shortDescription: Max Air cushioning for all-day comfort
longDescription: Nike Air Max 270 features the brand's largest Max Air unit yet (32mm) with a lightweight mesh upper and rubber outsole pods for durability.

name: React Infinity Run 4
longDescription: Nike React Infinity Run 4 with soft React foam, rocker geometry for smooth transitions, and Flyknit upper for breathable support during marathons.

name: Mercurial Superfly 9
longDescription: Nike Mercurial Superfly 9 features Flyknit upper with All Conditions Control, dynamic fit collar, and Aerotrak traction for explosive speed on pitch.

name: Metcon 8
longDescription: Nike Metcon 8 combines stability for lifting with flexibility for dynamic movements. Features Hyperlift insert for squats and rope-ready heel.

name: Dunk Low Retro
longDescription: Nike Dunk Low Retro features original 1985 basketball design with leather upper, padded collar, and rubber cupsole for casual street style.

name: Alphafly NEXT% 2
longDescription: Nike Alphafly NEXT% 2 features ZoomX foam, Air Zoom pods, and Atomknit upper for marathon racing. Worn by elite distance runners.

name: Pegasus 40
longDescription: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40 with Zoom Air units in forefoot, engineered mesh upper, and wider toe box for natural movement during runs.

name: Air Zoom Tempo NEXT%
longDescription: Nike Air Zoom Tempo NEXT% combines responsive ZoomX foam with durable ReactX foam. Ideal for tempo runs and interval training sessions.

name: Blazer Mid '77
longDescription: Nike Blazer Mid '77 Vintage features a retro suede upper, padded collar, and classic Swoosh design. Inspired by 1977 basketball heritage.
